channel.title: HELP can 2 people run a server at the same time
channel.description: helpp basicly my friend is not letting me dload his source so he said thiers a way to connect to each other but he dnt know how. :/ does anyone know a way???

item.title: HELP can 2 people run a server at the same time
item.dc:creator: @JohnnyWorldz517 JohnnyWorldz517
item.description:
@JohnnyWorldz517 wrote:

well, if you meant tht you could connect to his comp without dl , use teamwiever, if you meant connect with client, the guy need no-ip , portforward , just be more specific

item.title: HELP can 2 people run a server at the same time

item.title: HELP can 2 people run a server at the same time
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

Uh? there is a way to use 2 sources with the same character files… but that’s from the same computer not from different computers people usually use a virtual private server for that.
